name: Halloween Haste
description:
** THE GAME MUST BE RUN ON AT LEAST A 1080p MONITOR TO LOOK CORRECT**

A and D to move, Shift to Sprint, Space to Jump

If you stand still for you will die quickly if you walk slowly you will die quickly, If you sprint you will not lose health but beware of the Spikes Couldrons and Pitfalls.

Travel Through the Spooky Randomly Generated Terrain and see how far you can get before you die

Created for  GameDev Insiders Game #1 All assets created by Stephen Smith and Meghan Kelly (Audio done By Stephen Smith (Using My Mouth :P) 

All assets were made during the jam!
